title: Harvest Organic Grille
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Billed as a healthier eating concept. Has vegan choices like salad with tofu as add-on, veggies wrap, veggie burger, vegan desserts, fresh juices. A lot of meatstuff but labels what's vegan. Prices moderate to slightly more. Another location in Westchase District at 11681 Westheimer Rd.
